title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 462.5 - Records which are exempt from disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 462.5 - Records which are exempt from disclosure

State Regulations

The following records are exempt from disclosure: (a) records specifically prohibited by
statute from disclosure; (b) patient records concerning mental disabilities or medical records where access
is not otherwise required by law; (c) inmate records; (d) attorney's work product; (e) an accounting of a disclosure for law
enforcement purposes, if specifically notified not to make such disclosure by
the receiving agency; and
(f) records or information which are not identifiable or retrievable without
extraordinary search methods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

462.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
